flawed_nl_solution:
Peter has 19 - 7 = <<19-7=12>>12 years of experience.
Robert has 12 - 4 = <<12-4=5>>5 years of experience.
Mike has 5 - 2 = <<5-2=3>>3 years of experience.
Tom has 2 * 5 = <<2*5=10>>10 years of experience.
Roger has 12 + 5 + 3 + 10 = <<12+5+3+10=30>>30 years of experience.
Roger has to work another 50 - 30 = <<50-30=20>>20 years before he retires.
#### 20

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 8, not 5. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
